I actually really like this one. Let me know what you think!

item.title: May Be - Lex [Lofi?]
item.dc:creator: anon86704580
item.description:
It’s not lo-fi for sure. It’s kind of elevator music. Lol. Anyways, time to rate it.

Melody could use a bit more sustenance to it. The whole song kinda feels empty and in lack of instruments. I could totally study to this though, don’t get me wrong. Nice choice of drums. I really like that snare. Jelly seems a bit out of place.

Predictability: 6/10
Complexity: 5/10
Use of Automation: 5/10
Use of Instruments: 5/10
Appeal: 8/10

Overall: 29/50 Not bad. Keep it up!!

Read full topic
